text.0: acknowledge us o guardian of the homestead bring no disease and give us happy entrance.
text.1: whateer we ask of thee be pleased to grant it and prosper thou quadrupeds and bipeds.
text.2: protector of the home be our promoter increase our wealth in kine and steeds o indu.
text.3: may we be everyouthful in thy friendship be pleased in us as in his sons a father.
text.4: through thy dear fellowship that bringeth welfare may we be victors guardian of the dwelling.
text.5: protect our happiness in rest and labour preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
